trans-unit.source: Represents an x-, y-, and z-coordinate point in 3-D space.
trans-unit.target: 3-D 공간의 X, Y 및 Z 좌표 점을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: Xaml에서 값 사이의 구분 기호는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 쉼표 또는 공백이 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: 일부 문화권 소수점 구분 기호로 마침표 대신로 쉼표 문자를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 고정 문화권에 대 한 처리 하는 XAML 대부분 XAML 프로세서 구현에서 EN-US로 기본값을 소수 구분 기호로 마침표 속해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> attribute value into its components.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 경우 소수 구분 기호로 쉼표 문자를 사용 하면 안 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> XAML에서 문자열 형식 변환의 충돌은 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 해당 구성 요소에 특성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
The x-coordinate of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>.
The y-coordinate of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>.
The z-coordinate of this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>.

This example shows how to subtract <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 빼기 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 오버 로드 된 빼기를 사용 하 여 구조 (`-`) 연산자 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 정적 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The following code illustrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> subtraction methods.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 빼기 메서드.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structures are instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 첫째, 고 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체를 인스턴스화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are subtracted using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator and then they are subtracted using the static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 오버 로드 된 빼기를 사용 하 여 구조체를 뺀 (`-`) 연산자와 이러한 정적을 사용 하 여 제외 되며 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure is subtracted from the first <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure using the static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> method, and finally the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure is subtract from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> using the overloaded subtraction (`-`) operator.
trans-unit.target: 다음으로 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조에서 첫 번째 뺍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 정적을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Subtract%2A> 메서드를 마지막으로 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조에서 빼기는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 오버 로드 된 빼기를 사용 하 여 (`-`) 연산자.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> value of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to add.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to add.

Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체에 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 추가하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="point" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure is prohibited.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조가 허용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>를 추가하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.
The object to compare.

Determines whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and if so, whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> are equal to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> properties of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 개체가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체인지 확인하고, 해당 구조체인 경우 지정된 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 속성이 이 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> 구조체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 속성과 같은지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스가 서로 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and if it is also identical to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="o" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체이고 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체와도 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If `o` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure, this method returns `false`.

Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Double> 두 비교에서 산술 연산을 수행 되 면 값 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 논리적으로 동일한 인스턴스가 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check whether an object and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure are equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 개체를 확인 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조는 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> to compare to this instance.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.
<see langword="true" /> if instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스가 서로 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Double> 두 비교에서 산술 연산을 수행 되 면 값 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 논리적으로 동일한 인스턴스가 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> values for <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="point1" />과 <paramref name="point2" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 값이 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> 속성의 값이 같으면 두 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> 구조체가 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Double> 두 비교에서 산술 연산을 수행 되 면 값 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 논리적으로 동일한 인스턴스가 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의 여부를 확인 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
A hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The following example shows how to get the hash code of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 해시 코드를 가져오는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to transform.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure to use for the transformation.
Transforms the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure.
A transformed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure, the result of transforming <paramref name="point" /> by <paramref name="matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="point" />를 <paramref name="matrix" />에 따라 변환한 결과인 변환된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The amount to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" /> coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The amount to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The amount to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
Translates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified amounts.

This operation is equivalent to adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure with the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업은 해당 추가 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 해당 포함 된 구조 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Y%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D.Z%2A> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A> method will only have an effect if you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A> 메서드만 영향을 미칠 변경할 수 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> 속성을 직접 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> is a value type, if you reference a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 값 형식인를 참조 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 개체 속성 또는 인덱서를 사용 하 여 개체에 대 한 참조가 아니라 개체의 복사본을 얻게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to change <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 변경 하려는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> 속성 또는 인덱서 참조에서 컴파일러 오류가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A> on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로, 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Offset%2A> 속성 또는 인덱서에 기본 개체는 변경 되지 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, modify its fields, and then assign the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> back to the property or indexer.
trans-unit.target: 값을 변경 하려는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 속성 또는 인덱서 참조 되는, 새 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>, 해당 필드를 수정 하 고 그런 다음 할당할는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 속성 또는 인덱서를 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to offset a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 오프셋 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The point to add.
The vector to add.

Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체에 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체를 추가하고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure that is the sum of <paramref name="point" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure is prohibited.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조가 허용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for equality.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> coordinates of <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="point1" />과 <paramref name="point2" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 좌표가 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are the same.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체가 다른 경우 값을 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A> , 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> 속성은 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Double> 두 비교에서 산술 연산을 수행 되 면 값 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 논리적으로 동일한 인스턴스가 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded equality operator to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의 지 확인 하는 오버 로드 된 같음 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> structure.
The point to convert.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D" /> structure.
The result of converting <paramref name="point" />.
The point to convert.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
The result of converting <paramref name="point" />.
The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to compare.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structures for inequality.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> coordinates of <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" /> are different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="point1" />과 <paramref name="point2" />의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z" /> 좌표가 서로 다르면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are not equal if the values of their <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> properties are different.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조가 같지 않은지 경우 값을 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Y%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D.Z%2A> 속성은 서로 다릅니다.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Double> values can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> instances that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 <xref:System.Double> 두 비교에서 산술 연산을 수행 되 면 값 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 논리적으로 동일한 인스턴스가 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded inequality operator to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의 지 확인 하는 오버 로드 된 같지 않음 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The point to transform.
The matrix that is used to transform <c>point</c>.
Transforms the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> structure.
The result of transforming <paramref name="point" /> by using <paramref name="matrix" />.

The following example shows how to use the overloaded multiplication operator to transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 오버 로드 된 곱하기 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 를 사용 하 여 구조는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure on which to perform subtraction.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>point1</c>.

Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체를 빼고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure that represents the difference between <paramref name="point1" /> and <paramref name="point2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="point1" />과 <paramref name="point2" /> 간의 차를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded subtraction operator to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 빼기를 오버 로드 된 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 에서 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from which to subtract vector.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to subtract from point.

Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체를 빼고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The changed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure, the result of subtracting <paramref name="vector" /> from <paramref name="point" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector" />에서 <paramref name="point" />를 뺀 결과인 변경된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the overloaded subtraction operator to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 빼기를 오버 로드 된 연산자를 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 에서 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the 3-D point.
Converts a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a 3-D point into the equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 3차원 점의 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 표현을 해당 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to be subtracted from.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>point1</c>.

Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 구조체를 빼고 그 결과를 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체로 반환합니다.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="point1" />과 <paramref name="point2" /> 간의 차를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure from which to subtract <c>vector</c>.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to subtract from <c>point</c>.

Subtracts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> structure.

trans-unit.source: The difference between <paramref name="point" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
The following example shows how to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 뺄 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> 에서 구조체는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 구조입니다.

-or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
